_header: A widow poor was and free
Title(s): The Poor Widow and the Rich Man
_description: The Poor Widow and the Rich Man — five couplets in a collection of tags

CamTCC323.First Lines:
A vidue pouere was & freo& luttel lond held
                    heo…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…þe oþer þer fel in parlesieþe þrirde
                    firbraid ful witerlie
CamTCC323.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 49.
